name: CIGNEX Datamatics
description:
CIGNEX Datamatics (subsidiary of Datamatics Global Services Ltd.) is the global leader in Open Source Enterprise Solutions - Portals, Content and Big Data Analytics.
Since 2000 CIGNEX Datamatics has focused on "Making Open Source Work" for enterprises using industry-standard open platforms and integrating with existing systems to improve client’s profitability. Globally, by leveraging Open Source technologies like Liferay, Alfresco, Magento, Drupal, Hadoop, MongoDB, Talend, Moodle, MuleSoft, Ephesoft, and others, CIGNEX Datamatics provides solutions that help clients address business goals, increase business velocity, lower the cost of doing business, reduce TCO, and gain competitive advantage. CIGNEX Datamatics is a Platinum Partner and winner of Partner of the Year awards for 2010 & 2011 for Liferay and 2010 for Alfresco. CIGNEX Datamatics is headquartered in Santa Clara, USA and has 32 offices across 9 countries.
